trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all controls that act as containers for server controls (including Web Parts <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> controls, server controls, and user controls) in Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: Fungerer som basisklasse for alle kontrollene som fungerer som beholdere for serverkontroller (inkludert webdeler <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"> </xref> kontroller, serverkontroller og brukerkontroller) i webdeler programmer.

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts zone is a defined region that contains server controls on a Web page, and provides a consistent user interface (UI), layout, and rendering for the contained controls.
trans-unit.target: En webdeler sone er et angitt område som inneholder serverkontroller på en side, og gir konsekvent brukergrensesnittet (UI), oppsett og gjengivelse av inneholder kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: Zones are rendered in a browser as HTML tables.
trans-unit.target: Soner gjengis i en nettleser som HTML-tabeller.

trans-unit.source: The WebZone class is the base class for all Web Parts zones.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebZone er basisklasse for alle webdeler-soner.

trans-unit.source: A zone control is a composite control designed to contain other controls, hence the WebZone class inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> class.
trans-unit.target: En zone-kontroll er en sammensatt kontroll som inneholder andre kontroller, derfor WebZone klassen arver fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl>

trans-unit.source: Together with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> controls (or other user or server controls that can be placed in zones), zone controls derived from the WebZone base class form the essential building blocks of a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: Sammen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>Kontroller (eller andre bruker- eller kontroller som kan plasseres i soner) sone Kontroller avledet fra WebZone basisklassen skjemaet viktige bygging tidspunktene et webdeler-program.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A critical role of Web Parts zones is to enable full Web Parts functionality for the controls they contain.
trans-unit.target: En kritisk rolle for webdeler soner er å aktivere full webdeler funksjonalitet for kontrollene de inneholder.

trans-unit.source: Every Web Parts page contains at least one zone, and a zone can contain zero or more part controls.
trans-unit.target: Hver webdeler siden inneholder minst én sone, og en sone kan inneholde null eller flere deler-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Zones are required for Web Parts functionality.
trans-unit.target: Soner kreves for webdeler funksjonalitet.

trans-unit.source: Without zones, even controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class can have very little Web Parts functionality.
trans-unit.target: Soner, selv Kontroller avledes fra de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>klassen kan ha lite webdeler funksjonalitet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Conversely, because of the design of the Web Parts control set, you can place ordinary ASP.NET controls, server controls, or user controls into a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone (which derives from WebZone), and by virtue of being in the zone, these ordinary server controls are enable to act as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at run time.
trans-unit.target: Derimot på grunn av settet med webdeler kontrollen, kan du plassere vanlige kontroller i ASP.NET, serverkontroller eller brukerkontroller til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>sone (som er avledet fra WebZone), og som følge er i sonen disse vanlige server kontroller er Aktiver for å fungere som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller ved kjøretid.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: For details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon, kan du se dokumentasjonen for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to a page outside of a zone, but in that case they simply function as ordinary server controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Det er mulig å legge til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Kontroller til en side utenfor en sone, men i dette tilfellet de ganske enkelt å fungere som vanlig serverkontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>

trans-unit.source: There are two broad categories of zones in the Web Parts control set, all of which inherit from the base WebZone class.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes to bred kategorier av soner i webdeler kontrollen settet som arver fra basisklassen WebZone.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: These contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server and user) controls, and form the primary UI of Web Parts pages that users interact with most of the time.
trans-unit.target: Disse inneholder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(og andre servere og bruker) kontrollerer og utgjør primære Brukergrensesnittet for webdeler sidene brukere samhandle med oftest.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> zones.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: These zones provide special views of a Web Parts page that enable users to modify (personalize) the content, layout, appearance, behavior, and properties of controls contained in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Disse gir spesielle visninger av en webdeler side som Aktiver brukere å endre (tilpassing) innhold, oppsett, utseende, virkemåte og egenskaper i kontroller i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>soner på side webdeler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> that provides a catalog view of a page, enabling users to add and remove server controls.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>sonen er en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>som inneholder en katalog visning av en side, og at brukerne kan legge til og fjerne serverkontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone is another type of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> that provides an editing view of a page, enabling users to modify and edit the layout of the page, along with the properties, appearance, and behavior of the controls.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>sone er en annen type <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>som gir en redigering visning av en side, og at brukerne kan endre og redigere oppsettet for siden, sammen med egenskaper, utseendet og virkemåten til kontrollene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Each zone in the Web Parts control set is designed to contain a corresponding type of control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> class, with the part controls serving as the main content and primary UI of the zone.
trans-unit.target: Hver sone i webdeler kontrollsett som inneholder en tilsvarende kontrolltypen avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>klasse, del kontrollene som betjener som primære innhold og primære Brukergrensesnittet til sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>

trans-unit.source: Zone types in the Web Parts control set, along with the corresponding types of part controls they contain, are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Sone typer i kontrollen settet webdeler sammen med tilsvarende kontrolltypene del de inneholder, vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |Part control type|Zone type| |-----------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and server and user controls, which are wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> at run time)|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> (the base class is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> )| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls can be developed)|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> (the base class is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> )| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> (several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls can be developed)|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> (the base class is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> )| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> (connection controls are unique in that they are not part controls that inherit from the base class)|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> (inherits directly from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> )| All zones in the Web Parts control have basic, common user interface elements that they inherit from the base WebZone class.
trans-unit.target: | Del kontrolltypen | Sone typen | |-----------------------|---------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>(og serveren bruker kontrollene og, som er pakket med en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>ved kjøretid) |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> (basisklassen er <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>) | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>(flere avledede Kontroller leveres med webdeler kontrollen angitt og egendefinerte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller kan utviklet) |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> (basisklassen er <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>) | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>(flere avledede Kontroller leveres med webdeler kontrollen angitt og egendefinerte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>Kontroller kan utviklet) |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> (basisklassen er <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>) | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>(tilkobling kontroller er unike de ikke er en Delkontroller som arver fra basisklassen) | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>(arver direkte fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>) | Alle soner webdeler kontrollens har grunnleggende, vanlige elementer i brukergrensesnittet som de arver fra klassen. base WebZone</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Not all these elements are visible on every zone, but each zone type is capable of having these common, zone-related UI elements, as described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Ikke alle disse elementene som skal vises på hver sone, men hver zone-typen er kan ha disse vanlige, zone-relaterte UI-elementene, som beskrevet i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |Zone section|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |Header|The top section of a zone.
trans-unit.target: | Sone delen | Beskrivelse | |------------------|-----------------| | Hodet | Den øverste delen av en sone.

trans-unit.source: It includes header text, which can include a title for the zone; style attributes (such as a border or background color) that distinguish the header; and zone-level verbs (represented by buttons, hyperlinks, or images) that users can click to perform UI actions that apply to the entire zone, such as closing a zone.
trans-unit.target: Den inneholder tekst, som kan inneholde en tittel for sonen; Stilattributter (for eksempel en farge som ramme eller bakgrunn) som skiller tilfellet. og sone nivå verb (representert av knapper, hyperkoblinger eller bilder) som brukeren kan klikke for å utføre handlinger i Brukergrensesnittet som gjelder for hele sonen, for eksempel lukker en sone.

trans-unit.source: Several WebZone properties, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>, relate to the header area of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Flere WebZone egenskaper som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>, er knyttet til topptekstområdet i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are zone-level verbs in the zone, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbButtonType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> properties apply to them.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det ikke er sone nivå verb i sonen, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbButtonType%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>Egenskaper som gjelder for dem.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that these two verb properties apply to zone-level verbs only, not to verbs in the individual part controls contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at disse to verb egenskapene ikke gjelder bare sone nivå verb verb i individuelle del kontrollene i sonen.

trans-unit.source: Headers are not present in every type of zone; typically they appear in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> zones where there is a need to have a common header area with text and a verb, such as a close verb.| |Body|The main contents section of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Overskrifter finnes ikke i alle typer sone; vanligvis de vises i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>soner der det er en må ha et felles hodet område med tekst og et verb, for eksempel et Lukk verb. | | Meldingsteksten | Hovedvinduet innholdet av en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Every zone that derives from WebZone has a body section.
trans-unit.target: Alle soner som er avledet fra WebZone har en informasjon-delen.

trans-unit.source: For all types of zones in the Web Parts control set, the body of the zone contains the designated type of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> controls (or other server controls) that correspond to a zone type, as indicated in the previous table.
trans-unit.target: For alle typer soner i webdeler kontrollere sett, meldingsteksten i sonen inneholder den angitte typen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>Kontroller (eller andre serverkontroller) som tilsvarer typen sone som er angitt i tabellen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>

trans-unit.source: Various members of the WebZone class affect the contents of the body section, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.BackImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ulike medlemmer av klassen WebZone påvirke innholdet i delen body som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.BackImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.BackImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the body section is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> message can be displayed in certain situations.| |Chrome|The common UI elements rendered for each part control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Hvis hoveddelen er tom, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>meldingen kan vises i enkelte situasjoner. | | Chrome | De vanlige UI-elementene gjengis for hver del kontroll i en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is distinct from a discussion of style attributes that apply to the zone itself; chrome applies specifically to the contained part controls.
trans-unit.target: Dette er forskjellig fra en beskrivelse av Stilattributter som gjelder for sonen seg selv. Chrome gjelder spesielt for inneholder Delkontroller.

trans-unit.source: Chrome includes verbs, borders, and other style attributes such as background color, or font style of the title text, for a zone's part controls.
trans-unit.target: Chrome inneholder verb, kantlinjer og andre Stilattributter for eksempel bakgrunnsfarge eller skriftstilen for tittelteksten for en sone Delkontroller.

trans-unit.source: A zone determines the chrome details by using a single chrome object appropriate to the type of part controls it contains (e.g., a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> that contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls).
trans-unit.target: En sone bestemmer chrome detaljene ved hjelp av en passende å kontrolltypene del den inneholder én chrome-objektet (f.eks, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome>objekt en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>som inneholder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>Kontroller).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: This single chrome object handles the chrome details and the rendering for all the part controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet i én chrome håndterer chrome detaljene og gjengivelse for alle Delkontroller i sonen.

trans-unit.source: This enables developers to create zones in which they can specify a consistent, common look and feel for all the part controls.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det mulig for utviklere å opprette soner der de kan angi en konsekvent, vanlige utseendet for alle Delkontroller.

trans-unit.source: Some properties that relate to the chrome for a zone's part controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Noen egenskaper som er knyttet til chrome for en sone del omfatter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that most chrome-related properties, including a specific property to reference the chrome object for a particular type of zone, are not implemented in the base WebZone class.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at mest chrome-relaterte egenskaper, inkludert en bestemt egenskap referanse chrome-objekt for en bestemt type sone, ikke er implementert i basisklassen WebZone.

trans-unit.source: Instead, most chrome-specific features of zones are implemented on specific zone types as appropriate to the unique needs of their part controls.
trans-unit.target: De fleste chrome bestemt funksjonene i soner implementeres i stedet for bestemt sone datatyper som tilsvarer unike behovene kontrollene del.

trans-unit.source: See the topics for each zone type listed in the previous table of this topic.| |Part Controls|The controls that reside in the body section of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Se emner for hver sone oppført i tabellen tidligere i dette emnet. | | Del kontroller | Kontrollene som befinner seg i delen brødteksten i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Every zone that inherits from the WebZone class contains in its body section one or more part controls of a corresponding type, as shown in the previous table in this topic.
trans-unit.target: Alle soner som arver fra klassen WebZone inneholder body delen Delkontroller for én eller flere en av en tilsvarende typen, som vist i tabellen i dette emnet.

trans-unit.source: These part controls form the main UI of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: Disse del kontrollene utgjør primære Brukergrensesnittet for webdeler programmene.

trans-unit.source: Most zone types that derive from WebZone have a collection property that enables them to reference all their contained part controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class.| |Footer|The bottom section of a zone.
trans-unit.target: De fleste zone-typer som er avledet fra WebZone har en samling-egenskap som gjør det mulig for dem å referere til alle de inneholder en del kontrollene, for eksempel egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>klassen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>og egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A>på klassen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>. | | Bunntekst | Den nederste delen av en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EditorParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Like the header section, it is not present in every type of zone, but usually occurs in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> zones.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes ikke i alle typer sone som hodet-delen, men vanligvis oppstår under <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Typical contents of a footer section are verbs such as an ok verb or an apply verb, which appear in the footer of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: Vanlige innholdet i en bunntekst-delen er verb som et ok verb eller et Bruk verb som vises i bunnteksten <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Some properties that relate to the footer section include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbButtonType%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> properties.| Most of the WebZone class's properties are discussed in the preceding table that describes the common UI elements of zones.
trans-unit.target: Noen egenskaper som er knyttet til bunnteksten inkluderer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbButtonType%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A>Egenskaper. | De fleste av WebZone klasseegenskaper beskrives i tabellen ovenfor som beskriver vanlige UI-elementer i soner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.VerbButtonType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebZone class also has several methods relating to its role of rendering content.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WebZone har også flere metoder som er knyttet til rolle gjengivelse av innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderContents%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderFooter%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderHeader%2A> methods can all be overridden to provide programmatic control over the rendering of each specific section of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderContents%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderFooter%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderHeader%2A>metoder kan alle overstyres for å gi programmatisk kontroll over gjengivelse av hver bestemte del av en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderFooter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderContents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderBody%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to customize the rendering of all the footer sections of catalog zones in your application, you could inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderFooter%2A> method inherited from WebZone, and change the rendering of the footer section.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du vil tilpasse gjengivelse av alle bunntekst delene i katalogen soner i programmets, du kan arve fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>klasse, overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderFooter%2A>metoden arvet fra WebZone, og endre gjengivelse av bunnteksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderFooter%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to a background image for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir URL-adressen til et bakgrunnsbilde for en sone.

trans-unit.source: The background image for a zone is visible in all display modes in which a zone's contents are visible.
trans-unit.target: Bakgrunnsbildet for en sone vises i alle visningsmodus som en sone innholdet er synlig.

trans-unit.source: If a zone contains part controls, the image appears behind the controls.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en sone inneholder Delkontroller, vises bildet bak kontrollene.

trans-unit.source: If a zone contains no controls, its contents are not rendered in browse mode, so the image is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en sone inneholder ingen kontroller, gjengis ikke innholdet i lesemodus, slik bildet ikke vises.

trans-unit.source: If the supplied image is smaller than the body of a zone, it is tiled to cover the full body area.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det angitte bildet er mindre enn meldingsteksten i en sone, er det side ved side som dekker hele området.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used as a background image for the zone.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer URL-adressen til et bilde som brukes som et bakgrunnsbilde for sonen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en melding som vises når en sone inneholder ingen kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The text in the EmptyZoneText property appears when there are no controls in a zone, and the zone is in one of the personalization modes, such as edit, design, or catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: Teksten i egenskapen EmptyZoneText vises når det er ingen kontroller i en sone, og er i en av de personlige data modiene, for eksempel Rediger utformingen modusen, eller katalogen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a zone enters one of the personalization modes that would allow personalization changes to be made to the zone's contents, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AllowPageDesign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value to `true` on the display mode object referenced in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når en sone angir en av de personlige data modiene som tillater bruk av personlige data endringer gjøres i sonen innholdet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollerer angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AllowPageDesign%2A?displayProperty=fullName>verdien for egenskapen til `true` på Vis modus objektet det refereres til i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode.AllowPageDesign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: En streng med meldingen som vises i en tom sone.

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: En standard kultur-spesifikke streng er angitt av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style attributes for the placeholder text in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter attributtene stilen for plassholdertekst i en tom sone.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for the text assigned to a zone's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneText*> property.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for tekst som er tilordnet til en sone <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneText*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the style attributes for rendering the error message that is displayed if a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control cannot be loaded or created.
trans-unit.target: Henter attributtene stil for gjengivelse feilmeldingen som vises hvis en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen kan ikke laste inn eller opprettes.

trans-unit.source: At run time, if the .NET Framework is unable to load or create an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> class is created and displayed in its place.
trans-unit.target: På kjøretid, hvis .NET Framework kan ikke laste inn eller opprette en forekomst av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll, må en forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>klassen opprettes og vises i stedet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This object contains an error message, and the style attributes from the ErrorStyle property are applied to the error message.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet inneholder en feilmelding, og stil attributtene fra egenskapen ErrorStyle brukes til feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for the error message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for feilmelding.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style attributes for the contents of a zone's footer area.
trans-unit.target: Henter attributtene stil for innholdet i en sone bunntekstområdet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle"></xref> that contains style attributes for the contents of a zone's footer area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for innholdet i en sone bunntekstområdet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual or effective current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, given the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*> property of the zone and the current display mode of the Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den faktiske eller gjeldende gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> verdien for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>for sonen og gjeldende visningsmodusen for siden webdeler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A part control within the current zone.
trans-unit.target: En del kontroll i gjeldende sonen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value that contains the kind of border that currently frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> verdi som viser hva slags kantlinje som for øyeblikket rammer webdeler kontroller finnes i en sone.

trans-unit.source: part is .
trans-unit.target: partis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en sone har et bunntekst.

trans-unit.source: The HasFooter property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HasFooter brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere som oppretter egendefinerte soner.

trans-unit.source: It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a footer only when appropriate for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes som et flagg slik at webdeler kontrollere Sett gjengir bunntekst bare når det er nødvendig for en sone.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasFooter%2A> property overrides this property and returns `false`, so that a footer is not rendered for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasFooter%2A>egenskapen overstyrer egenskapen og returnerer `false`, slik at en bunntekst ikke gjengis for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasFooter%2A>

trans-unit.source: Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>) must have footers so that, for example, they can render common user interface (UI) verbs with buttons such as **OK**, **Apply**, and **Cancel** at the bottom of the zone.
trans-unit.target: Soner-verktøyet (soner indirekte avledes fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>klasse ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>class, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>) må ha bunntekst slik at du for eksempel de kan gjengi vanlige bruker brukergrensesnittet (UI) verb med knapper som **OK**, **Bruk**, og **avbryte** nederst i sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: Because the HasFooter property is `true` by default, tool zones do not need to override the property.
trans-unit.target: Fordi egenskapen HasFooter `true` som standard verktøyet soner ikke trenger å overstyre egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sonen har en bunntekstområdet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en sone har et hode.

trans-unit.source: The HasHeader property is primarily used by control developers who are creating custom zones.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HasHeader brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere som oppretter egendefinerte soner.

trans-unit.source: It exists as a flag so that the Web Parts control set renders a header only when appropriate for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes som et flagg slik at webdeler kontrollere Sett gjengir en topptekst bare når det er nødvendig for en sone.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasHeader%2A> property overrides this property and returns `false` unless the page is in one of the modes that allow personalization.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasHeader%2A>egenskapen overstyrer egenskapen og returnerer `false` siden er i en av modiene som tillater bruk av personlige data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, a header is not rendered for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control in browse mode, while in most other modes a header is rendered.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet gjengis ikke en topptekst for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>kontrollen i lesemodus, mens en topptekst gjengis i de fleste modusene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: For more information on display modes and enabling users to switch among them, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om visningsmodus og hvordan du aktiverer brukere å bytte mellom dem, kan du se [gjennomgang: endre Vis modi på en webside deler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Tool zones (zones that derive indirectly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class by means of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>) must have headers that appear only when the page is in the appropriate display mode.
trans-unit.target: Soner-verktøyet (soner indirekte avledes fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>klasse ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>class, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>) må ha overskrifter som vises bare når siden er i riktig visningsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: Because the HasHeader property is `true` by default, they do not need to override the property.
trans-unit.target: Fordi egenskapen HasHeader `true` som standard de trenger ikke å overstyre egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a header area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sonen har en topptekstområdet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style attributes for the contents of a zone's header area.
trans-unit.target: Henter attributtene stil for innholdet i en sone toppteksten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle"></xref> that contains style attributes for the contents of a zone's header area.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for innholdet i en sone toppteksten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the header area of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for toppteksten for en sone.

trans-unit.source: The contents of a zone's HeaderText property are displayed when a Web page enters certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i en sone HeaderText egenskapen vises når en webside går inn i enkelte visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: For example, on a page that has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control, the text assigned to the HeaderText property becomes visible when the page enters edit, catalog, or design mode.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel på en side som har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>kontroll, teksten tilordnet egenskapen HeaderText vises når siden angir Rediger, katalog eller utformingsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the header text for the zone.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder toppteksten for sonen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret tilstandsinformasjon for en sone.

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av .NET Framework-infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan imidlertid overstyre denne metoden hvis du vil angi hvordan en egendefinert serverkontroll gjenoppretter visningstilstanden.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [ASP.NET oversikt over tilstand](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method loads previously saved state information for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadViewState laster inn informasjon om tidligere lagret tilstand for en sone.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> method to also load state information for the various style properties of a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Den overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>metode for å laste også tilstandsinformasjon for ulike stilegenskaper for en sone, som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state.
trans-unit.target: Tidligere lagret tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The size of the savedState object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på den savedState objektet er ikke lik størrelsen på gjeldende visningsstatus objekt.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnInit method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method to register a zone with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnInit overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>metode for å registrere et område med de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The zone control was added at too late of a stage in the page life cycle, or the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Zone-kontroll ble lagt til i for sent for et trinn i livssyklusen siden eller <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A> method in order to prevent a zone from rendering if its parent control is another zone or a part control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>metode for å hindre at en sone gjengivelse hvis den overordnede kontrollen er en annen sone eller en del-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control is nested within another zone or within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"> </xref> kontrollen er nestet i en annen sone eller i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell padding attributes on the table that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir cellen utfylling attributter i tabellen som inneholder den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The number of pixels for the padding between items and their cell boundaries in the table rendered for a zone.
trans-unit.target: Antall piksler for utfyllingen mellom elementer og deres cellegrensene i tabellen gjengis for en sone.

trans-unit.source: The default is 2.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 2.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er satt til en verdi mindre enn-1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the contents of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and the border of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom innholdet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen og kantlinjen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to define a standard padding amount between the content of each control and its border for all controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å definere en standard utfylling avstanden mellom innholdet i hver kontroll og kantlinjen for alle kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> object that indicates the type of measurement and the amount of padding.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> objekt som angir hvilken type mål og utfylling.

trans-unit.source: The default padding for a zone is 5 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Standard utfylling for en sone er 5 piksler.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is a negative number.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er tilordnet egenskapen er et negativt tall.

trans-unit.source: Gets style characteristics that apply to the borders of Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen som gjelder for kantlinjer webdeler kontroller finnes i en sone.

trans-unit.source: A Web Parts control can have its own border, defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: En webdeler kontroll kan ha sin egen kantlinje, er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zone that contains the control can add an additional outer border around the control.
trans-unit.target: Sonen som inneholder kontrollen kan legge til en ekstra ytre kontrollens kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The outer border that a zone can place around each of its Web Parts controls is determined by the PartChromeStyle property.
trans-unit.target: Ytre kantlinjen som en sone kan sette rundt hver webdeler kontrollen er avhengig av egenskapen PartChromeStyle.

trans-unit.source: This property does not cancel out the property attributes contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> object; it is merged with or added to them.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen ikke avbryte egenskapsattributtene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>objekt; den er slått sammen med eller legges til.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: It enables a zone to provide a common and consistent border for each of the Web Parts controls it contains.
trans-unit.target: Det gjør det mulig for en sone for å angi en felles og konsekvent kantlinje for hver av webdeler kontrollene den inneholder.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Although the PartChromeStyle style settings apply primarily to the outer border that a zone can set around the controls it contains, if you set additional properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object referenced by the property, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A>, the browser interprets those style attributes as applying to all the sub-elements of the table used to render a zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Selv om PartChromeStyle stilinnstillingene gjelder først og fremst for ytre kantlinjen en sone kan angi kontrollene den inneholder, hvis du angir flere egenskaper for det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objektet som refererer til egenskapen eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A>, nettleseren tolker attributtene stilen som gjelder alle underordnede elementer i tabellen som brukes til å gjengi en sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Hence, setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A> property for the style object referenced by the PartChromeStyle property has the same effect on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control as setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A> property on the object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Derfor angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A>for stilen objektet refererer til egenskapen PartChromeStyle har den samme effekten på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen som innstillingen det <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A>egenskap i objektet refererer til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Style.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for the borders that surround Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for kantlinjer rundt webdeler kontroller finnes i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetypen forhandleren webdeler Kontroller inneholdt av en sone.

trans-unit.source: The PartChromeType property acts like a default property for the Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PartChromeType fungerer som en standardegenskap av webdeler kontrollene i en sone.

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts control has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A> property set, that property overrides the effect of the PartChromeType property at run time.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en webdeler har den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A>egenskapen angitt at egenskapen overstyrer effekten av egenskapen PartChromeType på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A> property is not set, or is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType>, the value of the PartChromeType property determines what kind of border the control has.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt eller er satt til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType>, verdien for egenskapen PartChromeType bestemmer hvilken kantlinje kontrollen har.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> that determines the type of border that frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> som bestemmer kantlinjetypen som rammer webdeler kontroller finnes i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets style characteristics that apply to the border and contents of each Web Parts control contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilen som gjelder for kantlinjen og innholdet i hver som en sone inneholder webdeler-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The style attributes apply to the border and contents of every Web Parts control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Attributtene stilen gjelder kantlinje og innholdet i alle webdeler kontroll i en sone.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to provide a consistent style for the contents of all the controls a zone contains.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan du angi en konsekvent stil for innholdet i alle kontrollene en sone inneholder.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle"></xref> that contains style attributes for the Web Parts controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for webdeler kontroller i sonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes for the title bar content for each Web Parts control contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter Stilattributter for tittelen for innhold for hver som en sone inneholder webdeler-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle"></xref> that contains style attributes for the title bar content for each Web Parts control in the zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.TitleStyle"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for tittelen for innholdet for hver webdeler kontroll i sonen.

trans-unit.source: Renders the opening HTML tag of the zone control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser åpning HTML-koden for zone-kontrollen til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The RenderBeginTag method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderBeginTag brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> control, the method sets style attributes for the HTML table that is rendered for the zone.
trans-unit.target: For en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>kontroll, metoden angir Stilattributter for HTML-tabellen som gjengis for sonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The style attributes help render the HTML table properly in supported browsers.
trans-unit.target: Attributtene stil bidra til å gjengi HTML-tabellen riktig i webleser som ikke støttes.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Overrides rendering for the body of a zone control.
trans-unit.target: Overstyringer gjengivelse for meldingsteksten i en zone-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The body of a zone control is the portion between its header and footer areas.
trans-unit.target: Meldingsteksten i en zone-kontroll er delen mellom leverandørens områder som topp- og bunntekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether to render client script on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om å gjengi klientskript på en webdeler-siden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone renders client script when the page is in a given display mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis sonen gjengir klientskript når siden er i en gitt visningsmodus; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Renders the entire contents of a zone control between the beginning and ending tags to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser hele innholdet i en sone kontroll mellom start- og slutt koder til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The RenderContents method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderContents brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A> method to render a zone when the zone's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A>metode til å gjengi en sone når i sonen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Overrides rendering for the footer of a zone control.
trans-unit.target: Overstyringer gjengivelse for bunntekst for en zone-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Overrides rendering for the header of a zone control.
trans-unit.target: Overstyringer gjengivelse for overskrift for en zone-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som representerer den utdata dataflyten som skal gjengi HTML-innhold på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred after a page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer endringer visningsstatus som oppstod etter at en side ble posteres tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A> method to save view-state changes to the various style properties of a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SaveViewState overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A>metode for å lagre visningsstatusen endringer i forskjellige stilegenskaper for en sone, som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the zone control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer sone kontrollens gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the zone, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen visningsstatus er knyttet til sonen, metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value that corresponds to this Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdien som tilsvarer denne webkontrollen for serveren.

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.
trans-unit.target: Sporer endres til en zone-kontroll visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A> method to track view-state changes to the various style properties of a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden TrackViewState overstyrer grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>metode for å spore visningsstatus endringer i forskjellige stilegenskaper for en sone, som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.FooterStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.TrackViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets what kind of button is used to represent verbs in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvilken type knappen brukes til å representere verb i en sone.

trans-unit.source: The VerbButtonType property can be used to determine how the verbs will appear in the verbs menu of a zone.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen VerbButtonType kan brukes til å finne ut hvordan verb som vises i verb meny med en sone.

trans-unit.source: Verbs can appear as a button, a hyperlink, or a clickable image.
trans-unit.target: Verb som kan vises som en knapp, en hyperkobling eller klikke bilde.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> that indicates what kind of button will be visible to represent verbs in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> som angir hvilken type knappen vil være synlig til å representere verb i brukergrensesnittet (UI).

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property is not set to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen er ikke satt til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref> verdi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style attributes for the user interface (UI) verbs associated with Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Henter attributtene stilen for brukeren brukergrensesnittet (UI) verb som er knyttet til webdeler kontroller i en sone.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for the verbs associated with Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> som inneholder Stilattributter for verb som er knyttet til webdeler kontroller finnes i en sone.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control associated with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"></xref> control instance on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som er knyttet til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone"> </xref> kontroll-forekomsten på webdeler side.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control that is associated with a zone.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> kontrollen som er knyttet til en sone.
